217ca4a8-f746-4b2f-a01b-bf4b8035a9d7:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"217ca4a8-f746-4b2f-a01b-bf4b8035a9d7","title":{"en":"Mama Detective Story"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"ママー探偵物語"},{"ja-ro":"Mama Tantei Monogatari"}],"lastChapter":"5","description":{"en":"*A manga work that Tezuka made when he was only 10 years old. Finally discovered and collected by 888 Books (who handles Yoichi Yokoyama's Gekiga) and published mid 2022.*\n\n(from fukkan.com)\n\nA major event in the history of manga!\nMany of the fantastic studies drawn by the young Osamu Tezuka are finally revealed in their entirety!\nAll works are included for the first time in a book, the ultimate collection of Tezuka manga that no one has ever seen before!\n\nAbout this book:\n　\nThis book is a collection of Osamu Tezuka's treasured manga, mainly \"Mama Detective Story\", which he made between the ages of 10 and 15. It is a collection of existing short and medium-length stories featuring the mysterious creature \"Mama\", some of which have been published and exhibited in mooks and exhibitions, but the full story has remained unknown.　\nSince his debut work \"The Diary of Ma-chan\" Osamu Tezuka published numerous works throughout his life, but the creation itself dates back to his earlier childhood.\n\nAlthough his drawings were initially done in the style of reproductions and kamishibai he created original characters as early as when he was in elementary school. \n\nEspecially famous are the many unidentified and mysterious creatures that interrupt the panels without regard to the development of the story, the first of which is the Hyotantsugi, followed by the mysterious \"Mama\" creature, which leaves a strong impression on the reader.\n\nIn \"Mama Detective Story\" which the young Tezuka drew for several years starting in 1938 when he was 10 years old (two works in existence), Mama played the leading role in an imposing manner and displayed a detective-like quality reminiscent of Mr. Mustachio who followed."},"links":{"amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/%E6%89%8B%E5%A1%9A%E6%B2%BB%E8%99%AB-%E3%83%9E%E3%83%9E%E3%83%BC%E6%8E%A2%E5%81%B5%E7%89%A9%E8%AA%9E/dp/4908439184/ref=monarch_sidesheet","cdj":"https://www.cdjapan.co.jp/product/NEOBK-2738740","raw":"https://www.fukkan.com/fk/CartSearchDetail?i_no=68330648"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"07251805-a27e-4d59-b488-f0bfbec15168","name":{"en":"Thriller"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"3de8c75d-8ee3-48ff-98ee-e20a65c86451","name":{"en":"Animals"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"5ca48985-9a9d-4bd8-be29-80dc0303db72","name":{"en":"Crime"}},{"id":"5fff9cde-849c-4d78-aab0-0d52b2ee1d25","name":{"en":"Survival"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"da2d50ca-3018-4cc0-ac7a-6b7d472a29ea","name":{"en":"Delinquents"}},{"id":"df33b754-73a3-4c54-80e6-1a74a8058539","name":{"en":"Police"}},{"id":"ee968100-4191-4968-93d3-f82d72be7e46","name":{"en":"Mystery"}}]}

2198e294-ec37-4fac-bdd8-fd8352fd072c:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"2198e294-ec37-4fac-bdd8-fd8352fd072c","title":{"en":"Masako Watanabe Masterpiece Selection - Horror/Suspense Portion"},"altTitles":[{"ja-ro":"Watanabe Masako Meisakushuu - Horror ・ Suspense-hen"},{"ja":"わたなべまさこ名作集 ホラー・サスペンス編"}],"description":{"en":"A collection of horror manga by the master of the shojo manga world, Masako Watanabe. \n\n(Note: volumes 1-2 are *[Saint Rosalind](https://mangadex.org/title/36717047-bcf7-4d75-8805-4892f5323f01/saint-rosalind).* This series contains a mix of Watanabe's work in shojo and josei magazines.)\n\n(from ebookjapan):\n\n- **[New Shinkei Kasanegafuchi](https://www.mangaupdates.com/series/zx210jt/shinshaku-shinkei-kasanegafuchi)** (新釈 真景累ヶ淵, Shinshaku Shinkei Kasanegafuchi) - It was the 2nd year of An'ei Era, and the end of the year was approaching. Okane, the wife of Minagawa Soetsu, left behind her two lovely daughters and her blind husband, and visited the Fukami family where she had been serving her apprenticeship. Despite a sense of disquiet, Okane worked hard at her work, but her fears soon turned into reality, and a harsh fate awaited her, one in which she would never return to her own home again!　The deep resentment between Muneyoshi and Okane, the couple who died an untimely death, will continue for generations to come...  (Alternate take of a kaidan-rakugo.)\n- **The House Where Death Dwells** (死の棲む家, Shi no Sumu Ie) - Riyako and Masaki have been lovers for over four years in the same department. However, when Masaki changes his mind, Riyako decides to break up with him and invites him on a last trip, but she ends up at the scene of the suicide of a shadowy woman she saw on the way. Masaki coldly rejects Riyako, who feels the presence of the dead woman and complains to him.　After a long journey, she arrives at a disturbing inn... a house of horror that leads her to the world of death! Includes the title story, \"Kaidan Yoki\" and \"Woman's Head\".\n- **[Depths of the Pit](https://www.mangaupdates.com/series/ov8ouc1/ana-no-soko)** (穴の底, Ana no Soko) - One night, Katsuya Nakaoka, a company employee who rolls dung at a tavern, sees a newspaper article about a series of missing people on their way home from work. On his way home, as he walks unsteadily along a dark back alley, Katsuya suddenly falls into a hole!　The hole is as deep as it can go, and eventually a strong shock causes him to lose consciousness, but when he wakes up, he finds himself in a field of creepy glowing grass. He finds a light and turns to it for help, but there is a promise... In addition to the title story, \"Ghost Story: Red Glass\" and \"Evil Spirits\" are included.\n- **[Off... To Beddy-Bye](https://www.mangaupdates.com/series/8m3twft/nenne-shina)**  (ねんね…しな, Nenne... Shina) - Sayaka grew up with her grandparents without parents. She is bullied by three girls in the same class, but she is unable to tell her strict grandfather, who hates timidity, and when he finds out, he becomes furious. Sayaka, who has nowhere else to go, embraces a Japanese doll, a memento of her grandmother, and throws herself off the balcony as if guided by a lullaby, hoping to visit her late, kind grandmother. Later, it is rumored that the doll has disappeared from Sayaka's coffin--but what happens next? Includes the title story and three other stories, \"Dead Woman's Love,\" \"Witch Resurrection,\" and \"Oni Azami.\"\n- **The House of Rotting Fish**  (魚のくさる家, Sakana no Kusaru Ie) - Wakako falls in adulterous love with her boss Naoto. Naoto's wife is driven into a mental corner and commits suicide, leaving their small daughter behind. Wakako is now his wife, but things do not go well with Nozomi, his ex-wife's child, and she even begins to hate him. When he buys the home he has always wanted and moves into a new house, Nozomi begins to talk about her mother being there. Wakako senses something is wrong and starts to tremble... In addition to the title story, \"String\" and \"Dream on an Autumn Night: Glassy Ayami\" are included.\n- **Fear Street** (恐怖街, Kyoufu no Machi) - After an accident on a deserted Boston street at night, Margery wakes up with no memory and suspected of murder. In her bag, bright red lipstick and ID card, which were found on the body at the scene, reveal her to be the daughter of a wealthy man. When she returns to the mansion, Simon, the police inspector, is frightened by her inability to remember anything, and he senses something strange about the house, but her guardian, Ciel, stops him from keeping an eye on her.... Is Margery really a murderer? A suspense thriller! Includes the title story as well as \"A Thread of Fate... Dyed Red\" and \"Kaidan: The One-Eyed Cat.\"\n- **[Cousin Jezebel](https://www.mangaupdates.com/series/tw7xh03/itoko-jezebel              )**  (従妹イゼベル, Itoko Izebel) - London, the late 1800s. Kind-hearted and intelligent Rhys returns home after three years as a nurse to work alongside her father, a respected doctor. However, her father dies suddenly on the same day, her mother collapses, and she loses her dreams and her fortune. She is saved by her boyfriend, Wanda, but one day, while she is spending her darkest days, a police officer brings a shabby young girl to her door... When her cousin and sister, Isabelle, appears, the wheels of Rhys's life begin to spin out of control...! 21f6476d-3bdf-482b-a315-6b4ea3e3240a:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"21f6476d-3bdf-482b-a315-6b4ea3e3240a","title":{"en":"Tensei Oujo no Mattari Nonbiri!? Isekai Recipe"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"転生王女のまったりのんびり！？異世界レシピ"}],"description":{"en":"Saya plans to become a chef so that she can someday take over her family's restaurant. Then, one fateful day, she gets into an accident....\n\nWhen she opens her eyes again, it's as a pretty young girl with blond hair and blue eyes - she's been reborn as \"Princess Viola\"! As if that wasn't enough to cope with, this Viola has it hard. 22415b98-e933-44ae-a139-f35fcd15d190:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"22415b98-e933-44ae-a139-f35fcd15d190","title":{"en":"Mr. Werewolf's Love"},"altTitles":[{"zh":"狼元帅的双重宠爱"},{"zh-ro":"Lang Yuanshuai De Shuangchong Chongai"},{"en":"The Wolf Marshal's Double Doting"},{"en":"Special Favours"}],"lastChapter":"38","availableTranslatedLanguages":["es","en"],"description":{"en":"Ryan is the son of the Prime Minister of the Blue Moon Empire and has a distinguished background. Even so, Ryan is forced to endure the abuse from his half-brother throughout the year since he is not a favored child of the household. Upon his half-brother’s coming of age birthday party, Ryan manages to escape but only to be kidnapped by traffickers and auctioned off in an underground market. Imagine Breaker can defeat any other power, but it also undermines Kamijou's own good luck. Дар у парня весьма странный: его правая рука – универсальный негатор, то есть, обнуляет любое парафизическое, магическое или божественное воздействие. А раз так, считает Тома, то и немногие крупицы счастья, посылаемые судьбой, до него просто не доходят, и вся его жизнь – полная невезуха (его любимая фраза). То на телефон наступит, то не с теми парнями свяжется, то обнаружит на перилах собственного балкона на редкость милое и голодное юное создание в костюме монашки…  \n  \nАдаптация ранобэ Toaru Majutsu no Index от Камати Кадзумы.|"},"links":{"al":"37775","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/gp/product/B07572G9W3","ap":"a-certain-magical-index","bw":"series/2157/list","cdj":"http://www.cdjapan.co.jp/product/NEOBK-970489","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/154710/","engtl":"https://yenpress.com/series/a-certain-magical-index-manga","kt":"15914","mal":"7775","mu":"13800","nu":"toaru-majutsu-no-index","raw":"https://www.ganganonline.com/title/1435"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"suggestive","tags":[{"id":"256c8bd9-4904-4360-bf4f-508a76d67183","name":{"en":"Sci-Fi"}},{"id":"2d1f5d56-a1e5-4d0d-a961-2193588b08ec","name":{"en":"Loli"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"a1f53773-c69a-4ce5-8cab-fffcd90b1565","name":{"en":"Magic"}},{"id":"aafb99c1-7f60-43fa-b75f-fc9502ce29c7","name":{"en":"Harem"}},{"id":"b29d6a3d-1569-4e7a-8caf-7557bc92cd5d","name":{"en":"Gore"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}},{"id":"ee968100-4191-4968-93d3-f82d72be7e46","name":{"en":"Mystery"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}}]}

Este terrível crime aconteceu com a irmã mais nova do colegial Kousuke.  Sem outra opção, ele cuida da irmã peixinho como pode.\n  \nUm dia, ele encontra uma garota estranha chamada Ringo, que veste um maiô escolar, carrega um guarda-chuva e mantém uma arma pendurada no pescoço. Ringo é um aprendiz de mergulhador de sangue, e a arma é sua maneira de atirar nas feridas das vítimas do homem do aquário. Se ela conseguir alcançá-los a tempo, poderá impedir que se transformem em peixinhos dourados.  O mentor de Ringo, Ichigo, diz que ouviu falar de uma maneira de transformar as pessoas de peixinhos dourados em humanos. Kousuke está determinado a ajudar Ringo a encontrar uma maneira de ajudar sua irmã e os entes queridos de seus amigos na escola que encontraram o mesmo destino de peixe!\n\nOne-shots inclusas:\nVolume 2: Jigoku (Inferno), Kappa no Shokutaku (A Janta do Kappa)\nVolume 3: Onikujo (Oni Killer)"},"links":{"al":"68111","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B019IH0E4C","ap":"chimoguri-ringo-to-kingyobachi-otoko","bw":"series/58987/list","cdj":"https://www.cdjapan.co.jp/product/NEOBK-1896421","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/345273","kt":"17123","mal":"38111","mu":"62896"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"cdad7e68-1419-41dd-bdce-27753074a640","name":{"en":"Horror"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}},{"id":"ee968100-4191-4968-93d3-f82d72be7e46","name":{"en":"Mystery"}}]}

Yet the Constables' reputation strongly precedes them:  \n  \nThe Emotionless cripple is a master of weapons and devices.   \nThe Iron Hand possesses incredible chi and can stop the sharpest blades bare-handed.   \nThe Life Snatcher is highly skilled in lightfoot granting him undaunted legwork.   \nThe Cold Blooded was raised by wolves and since learned to transfer his pain when fighting to strength enabling him to defeat opponents much stronger than himself.   \n  \nEach of them is entrusted by the Emperor with the power to arrest and execute any corrupt officials or lawless criminals with the Chinese Empire. These Imperial Constables act as protectors. Will Keijirou really be of help, or will he be more of a hindrance to Tomura?  \n  \nStory 2 (chapter 3-4) Nanjo is asked by his friend Kenji to be a replacement gigolo for him. Because of his position where he works it's hard for him to find someone he can just talk to. With Nanjo's egotistical and blunt way of speaking will this one night job last as long as it should, or is this the start of a wonderful friendship?  \n  \nExtra story (chapter 5) Misaki is an average business man. 22f1ed48-c584-422a-abc5-5ae6df3e5cfa:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"22f1ed48-c584-422a-abc5-5ae6df3e5cfa","title":{"en":"Kyuukyoku Shinka shita Full Dive RPG ga Genjitsu yori mo Kusoge Dattara"},"altTitles":[{"en":"What If the Ultimately Evolved Full Dive RPG was a Crappier Game than Reality"},{"ja":"究極進化したフルダイブRPGが現実よりもクソゲーだったら"},{"en":"Full Dive: This Ultimate Next-Gen Full Dive RPG Is Even Shittier than Real Life!"}],"lastChapter":"11","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en","pt-br"],"description":{"en":"In an unexpected turn of events, dull high school student Hiro Yuuki obtains the full dive role-playing game Kiwame Quest. Created by the best of technology, the game claims to take \"reality to its extremes,\" from stunning graphics, NPCs' behavior, to the scent of vegetation, and even the sensation of wind brushing against the skin—everything was the result of an ultimate workmanship.\n\nExcept, the game is a little too realistic and messy to clear. Kiwame Quest features over ten quadrillion flags and reflects the players' real-life physical abilities in the game. Being hit in the game also hurts in real life and slash wounds take days to heal.\n\nThe only reward here is the sense of accomplishment. Conquer the most stressful game in history that can't be played casually!","ja":"冴えない高校生・結城宏がひょんなことから入手したフルダイブRPG『極クエスト』。\n技術の粋を集めて作られたこのゲームは「リアルを極めた」という謳い文句に違わず、グラフィック、NPCの挙動、草木の香りや肌をなでる風、すべてが究極の出来映えであった――。\nリアル過ぎて、クリア不可能なほど「めんどくさい」ゲームである、ということ以外は。\n「フラグ数10,000,000,000,000,000以上!? 身体能力も現実そのままかよ!!」\n「ええ。殴られれば痛いし、斬られれば数日は傷が治らない。史上最高にリアルなゲームよ!」\n報酬は達成感のみ。軽い気持ちで遊べない、史上最もストレスフルなゲームを攻略せよ!","pt-br":"Em uma reviravolta inesperada dos acontecimentos, o estúpido estudante do ensino médio Hiro Yuuki obtém o jogo de RPG de imersão completa Kiwame Quest. Criado com o melhor da tecnologia, o jogo afirma levar \"a realidade a seus extremos\", desde gráficos impressionantes, comportamento de NPCs, ao cheiro da vegetação e até mesmo a sensação do vento batendo contra a pele, tudo resultado de um acabamento extremo. Exceto que o jogo é um pouco realista e confuso demais para ser exato. Kiwame Quest apresenta mais de dez quatrilhões de indicadores e reflete as habilidades físicas da vida real dos jogadores no jogo. Ser atingido no jogo também dói na vida real e feridas de corte levam dias para cicatrizar. A única recompensa aqui é a sensação de realização. Premio Shogakukan 2005 come miglior shonen, è la storia di Ichigo Kurosaki, un ragazzo dotato di un’abilità molto particolare: è in grado di vedere i fantasmi. E se la sua vita è già pazzesca a causa di questo dono, immaginate cosa gli potrebbe succedere se diventasse… un dio della morte?! Un intreccio appassionante, animato da un cast di personaggi estremamente variegato e impreziosito da uno stile di disegno attentissimo ai dettagli e originale nella fusione effettuata di vecchie e nuove tendenze, strizzando l’occhio, soprattutto per quanto riguarda l’abbigliamento dei personaggi, alla moda alternativa streetwear. Da “Bleach”, serializzato su “Weekly Shonen Jump”, è stata tratta anche una serie animata, il cui primo episodio è stato trasmesso in Giappone nel 2004 e che sta riscuotendo tutt’ora un grande successo.","ja":"黒崎一護・15歳・ユウレイの見える男。その特異な体質のわりに安穏とした日々を送っていた一護だが、突如、自らを死神と名乗る少女と遭遇、「虚」と呼ばれる悪霊に襲われる。次々と倒れる家族を前に一護は！？","pl":"Ichigo Kurosaki, lat 15. Обязанность шинигами – выслеживать пустых и отправлять их в общество душ.","tr":"Ichigo Kurosaki her zaman hayaletleri görebilmiştir, ancak bu yeteneği onun hayatını, bir Ruh Emici ve gizemli Ruh Topluluğu üyesi olan Rukia Kuchiki ile yakın karşılaşması kadar değiştirmez. Psişik enerji sergileyen insanları avlayan kötü bir ruh olan Hollow ile savaşırken, Rukia ailesini kurtarabilmesi için Ichigo'ya güçlerinin bir kısmını ödünç vermeye çalışır, ancak Ichigo onu şaşırtacak şekilde enerjisinin son damlasına kadar emer.   Artık tam teşekküllü bir Ruh Emici olan Ichigo, içinde yaşadığı dünyanın tehlikeli ruhlarla dolu olduğunu çabucak öğrenir ve güçlerini yavaş yavaş geri kazanan Rukia ile birlikte, Ichigo'nun görevi hem masumları Hollow'lardan korumak hem de ruhların kendilerinin huzur bulmasına yardımcı olmaktır.","uk":"Сучасний японський школяр Ічіґо відрізняється від тисяч інших не тільки рудим волоссям і дивним ім'ям (в перекладі з японської – полуниця). Він змалку здатен бачити і спілкуватися із духами. Та після зустрічі з дівчиною-шініґамі Рукією він отримує нові здібності, а разом з ними і обов'язки захищати світ від злих духів.","vi":"Kurosaki Ichigo là một học sinh cấp 3 có khả năng nhìn thấy linh hồn. Một ngày nọ, cậu tình cờ gặp Kuchikia Rukia – một cô gái tự xưng là Tử thần đến từ Soul Society. Ichigo không ngờ rằng, cuộc gặp ấy đã hoàn toàn thay đổi cuộc đời cậu.\n\nĐể bảo vệ gia đình mình, Ichigo đã nhận lấy sức mạnh từ Rukia để chiến đấu với Hollow. Tuy nhiên, cậu vô tình chiếm hết toàn bộ sức mạnh của Rukia khiến cô không thể quay về Soul Society. Trong lúc chờ sức mạnh của Rukia phục hồi, Ichigo buộc phải thay cô gánh vác nhiệm vụ của một Tử thần, đó là dẫn độ linh hồn người chết sang thế giới bên kia và tiêu diệt Hollow - những linh hồn xấu đe dọa đến các linh hồn khác và cả con người…"},"links":{"al":"30012","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B01GO0P3BK","ap":"bleach","bw":"series/13004/list","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/132455","engtl":"https://www.viz.com/bleach","kt":"37","mal":"12","mu":"35","raw":"https://shonenjumpplus.com/episode/10833519556325021930"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"0a39b5a1-b235-4886-a747-1d05d216532d","name":{"en":"Award Winning"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}}]}

23a2a55e-aa51-4c4b-8f8e-dd91b4b654e8:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"23a2a55e-aa51-4c4b-8f8e-dd91b4b654e8","title":{"en":"This Witch of Mine"},"altTitles":[{"ko":"나의 마녀"},{"ko-ro":"Naui Manyeo"},{"en":"Succuba's Servant"},{"en":"Witch of Mine"},{"fr":"Ma sorcière à moi"},{"fr":"C'est ma sorcière"},{"zh":"魔女的小跟班"},{"ru":"Моя ведьма"},{"th":"แม่มดของฉัน"},{"de":"My Witch"},{"vi":"Phù Thủy của tôi"},{"pt-br":"Esta Minha Bruxa"}],"lastChapter":"63","availableTranslatedLanguages":["pt-br","tr","fr"],"description":{"de":"»My Witch« spielt in einer Zeit, in der man Frauen, die besonders klug oder besonders dumm, besonders gut oder besonders böse, vielleicht aber auch nur zu hübsch sind, nur allzu leicht als Hexen diffamiert. Im Mittelpunkt der Geschichte stehen Cordelia, Philippa und Colin.\n\nDie blonde Cordelia halten alle für eine Hexe, obwohl sie sich eigentlich nur gut mit Kräutern auskennt und ihr Wissen den Leuten im Dorf zur Verfügung stellt. Den meisten ist es einfach ein Dorn im Auge, dass Cordelia unglaublich hübsch ist.\n\nDie rothaarige Philippa wiederum scheint zunächst die eigentliche Böse zu sein, denn sie schiebt Cordelia die Folgen ihrer bösartigen Streiche in die Schuhe. Das glaubt zumindest Colin, der sich mit dem Ziehen von Kerzen über Wasser hält, seit er seinen rechten Arm verloren hat.\n\nEines Tages kommt es im Dorf wieder einmal zum Streit und die Dinge eskalieren. Der Mob des Dorfes läuft Amok, glaubt Philippa auf die Schliche gekommen zu sein und erschlägt sie. Doch es stellt sich heraus, dass Philippa gar nicht wirklich tot und Cordelia eigentlich ihre Schwester ist.\n\nCordelia befreit Philippa aus ihrem Grab und beide wollen ihrer Wege gehen, doch ihr Tun wurde von Colin beobachtet. Der ist von all dem so fasziniert, dass auch er nicht zurück ins Dorf will, sondern sich stattdessen Philippa anschließt…\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Bomtoon](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/My_witch), [BookCube](http://www.bookcube.com/toon/detail.asp?webtoon_num=150087), [Daum](http://webtoon.daum.net/webtoon/view/mywich), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=48439569), [Mr.Blue](https://www.mrblue.com/webtoon/wt_mywitch_wz), [Naver Series](http://naver.me/GbKOBE2L), [Onestory](https://onestory.co.kr/detail/H029966498), [Peanutoon](https://www.peanutoon.com/ko/comic/detail/4413), [QToon](https://www.qtoon.co.kr/toon/list.mg?tcode=xlrq)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](http://www.tappytoon.com/series/thiswitch/)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.manmanapp.com/comic-1404838.html)\n* [French / Français](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/this-witch-of-mine/list?title_no=4244)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/this-witch-of-mine/list?title_no=3930)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.webtoons.com/th/romance/this-witch-of-mine/list?title_no=4166)","en":"In these times, if you're too good or bad at something or simply too beautiful, you're called a witch. The lone storyteller sits on stage. Using only a paper fan and a small cloth as props, and without standing up from the seiza sitting position, the rakugo artist depicts a long and complicated comical (or sometimes sentimental) story. The story always involves the dialogue of two or more characters. The difference between the characters is depicted only through change in pitch, tone, and a slight turn of the head.  \n  \n**Links:**  \n- [Original Web Novel](http://ncode.syosetu.com/n9574di/) (Raw)"},"links":{"al":"125028","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B07V1WY2DG","ap":"isekai-rakugo","bw":"series/179218","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/498079/","kt":"54981","mal":"118647","mu":"149655","raw":"https://web-ace.jp/youngaceup/contents/1000084/"},"originalLanguage":"ja","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"ace04997-f6bd-436e-b261-779182193d3d","name":{"en":"Isekai"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}}]}

Since then, Chitose has been moved by Touma’s straightforwardness and thinks that “if I were to fall in love again, I want it to be him”.\n\nThe two finally fall in love with each other, and spend a hot night together, where she feels ecstasy just from him touching her… Whilst on a date one day, Chitose finds out about Touma’s other identity. 246f7bf2-d53e-4be5-a704-7921e74b2c57:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"246f7bf2-d53e-4be5-a704-7921e74b2c57","title":{"en":"Japan"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"ジャパン"},{"ru":"Япония"}],"lastChapter":"8","availableTranslatedLanguages":["es","en","pt-br"],"description":{"en":"Yuka Katsuragi, a beautiful TV news reporter, has attracted the affections of a Yakuza thug, Katsuji Yashima, who travels with his brother all the way to Spain to find her, only to have his affections rebuffed by Yuka. A terrible earthquake hits, and Katsuji, his brother, and Yuka, along with four high-schoolers in Spain on a field trip, all fall deep underground. While trapped below the surface, they encounter a mysterious old woman who reveals to them prophecies that the wealthy nation of Japan will meet the same demise as the once-prosperous city of Carthage. Katsuji and the others insult the old woman, who then sends them to see the world of the future with their own eyes, a future of desolation and death…","pt-br":"Yuka Katsuragi, uma bela repórter da televisão, chamou a atenção do Yakuza Katsuji Yashima, que viaja com seu irmão até a Espanha para encontrá-la, apenas para levar um pé na bunda. Um terrível terremoto atinge a terra, e Katsuji, seu irmão, e Yuka, junto de outros quatro estudantes que estavam em uma viagem escolar a Espanha, caem todos em uma cratera subterrânea. Enquanto presos abaixo da superfície, eles encontram uma velha misteriosa, que revela a eles profecias que a próspera nação do Japão encontrará o mesmo fim de Cartago. Katsuji e os outros insultam a velha mulher, que os manda a um mundo do futuro, um futuro de desolação e morte. Da arte do mestre autor de Berserk, Miura Kentaro!"},"links":{"al":"30968","ap":"japan","bw":"deaf1af50f-3dae-423c-9854-072add8154d9","engtl":"https://www.darkhorse.com/Books/10-701/Japan-TPB","kt":"2113","mal":"968","mu":"2784","raw":"https://younganimal.com/series/d1392d7d1d9eb/"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"suggestive","tags":[{"id":"292e862b-2d17-4062-90a2-0356caa4ae27","name":{"en":"Time Travel"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"5fff9cde-849c-4d78-aab0-0d52b2ee1d25","name":{"en":"Survival"}},{"id":"85daba54-a71c-4554-8a28-9901a8b0afad","name":{"en":"Mafia"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"9467335a-1b83-4497-9231-765337a00b96","name":{"en":"Post-Apocalyptic"}},{"id":"97893a4c-12af-4dac-b6be-0dffb353568e","name":{"en":"Sexual Violence"}},{"id":"b29d6a3d-1569-4e7a-8caf-7557bc92cd5d","name":{"en":"Gore"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}},{"id":"f8f62932-27da-4fe4-8ee1-6779a8c5edba","name":{"en":"Tragedy"}}]}
